What does it look like?

What does the code look like?

  • posts & landingPages - Directories that holds the .mdx files
  • pages/posts.js & pages/landingPages.js - Templates that render the posts
  • exportPosts.js - Builds the posts index
  • next.config.js - Sets up exportPath for static export
